column2: English
Training
Papa Bear, Alpha Black here. We've taken the town of Vaals. Over.
Papa Bear, do you read? This is Alpha One. Enemy field headquarters is clear. All personnel terminated. With extreme prejudice. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Ammo Cache destroyed. It's still on fire. Over.
Alpha to Papa. The town of Acquoy is under NATO control. Alpha out.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. There's been a sharp fight at Vaals. Send us reinforcements and ammo, otherwise we're probably not going to keep it. Over.
Alpha. Who's your daddy. Wilco, we're dispatching some backup to your location. Hold in place. Over.
Alpha One, read you well. Nice work. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear to Alpha One. We copy you. Good work. Out.
Papa to Alpha One. Roger that, Alpha. Watch out for reaction squads coming to your position. Out.
Alpha, this is Papa Bear. Received and understood. Good job. Out.
Alpha, congratulations on your safe return. Your mission is accomplished. Papa Bear out.
Shallow Grave
McKenzie, Regular, at US Army Base.
Start
Capture Vaals
Clear Field HQ
Destroy Ammo Cache
Capture Acquoy
